introduction: Mr. Minor, an art student stuck in the worst art class on the planet, is under great pressure. He's having a pretty hard time keeping up with the deadline. Not enough talent or not enough discipline will mean only one thing: you're out for good. While the clock is ticking to start another drawing, he still needs to finish this one and the dictator-like teacher is coming closer by the second to disapprove his work. Luckily there's some unexpected help. The nude model rings the bell prematurely and just in time he gets the chance to hide his failure. The model seems to have developed an interest in him and asks him to kiss her. Will Mr. Minor be able to get the girl while surviving this day of art class? Written by Arnoud Tiele (imdb@tiele.nl)
